name: Warrior Tactics Trial: A Strong Sword
description: In order to learn the basic tactics of Warrior, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel
steps: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel
Attack an enemy with Aerial Hack
Attack an enemy with Savage Lash
Charge the revenge gauge with Brace.
Attack an enemy with Savage Lash with a full Revenge Gauge
Cling to the Cyclops in the deeper chamber and use Inverse Slash.
Collect the proof of completing the trial
Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
